::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, sf, ggstatsplot, tmap)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages("maptools",
                 repos="https://packagemanager.posit.co/cran/2023-10-13")
```
:::


Read file


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_sf <- st_read(dsn = "data/MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundaryWebSHP",                 
               layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
```

:::
:::


Issue 2: Creating coastal outline

**st_union() to derive the coastal outline sf tibble data.frame**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sg_sf <- mpsz_sf %>% 
  st_union()

plot(sg_sf)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
acled_sf <- read_csv("data/ACLED_Myanmar.csv") %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c(
    "longitude", "latitude"),
    crs=4326) %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 32647) %>% 
  mutate(event_date = dmy(event_date))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

